creditline: Gift of LeRoy and Cathy Draine in appreciation of Nigerian art and culture
description: human figures with geometrically decorated dress and body markings seated along with various pots and bowls; some figures are holding children, some are stirring bowls, and one is resting head in hands; blue tones
markings: lower L margin, pencil: 11/20 | pencil markings on back
signed: lower margin in pencil: Moods in a Market | -Deep etching | Bruce Onobrakpeya | January 1971 | [illeg.] | title also printed in image, LLC
title: Moods in a Market
